channel.title: Ok well, I have never used Scar before, so I'm sure this will be easy to answer
channel.description:
As I stated in the above, I have never used scar before, so I was using a seemingly simple script for NeoPets. But apparently I am Scar stupid, because I keep getting this error:
Failed when compiling Line 1: [Error] (1:1): Unable to register function function FindGapsTPA(TPA : TPointArray; MinPixels: Integer): T2DPointArray; in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\Scripts\Kill the fuzzies.scar
Lol, so I haven't the slightest idea what to do...

item.title: Ok well, I have never used Scar before, so I'm sure this will be easy to answer
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Well first of all your scar version is outdated. Update to the newest version here: http://freddy1990.com/scar.php
Then you need to set up SRL, you can follow this tutorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,263470.0.html

Now try and run the script.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok well, I have never used Scar before, so I'm sure this will be easy to answer
